step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades closer together as you begin the roll.
Keep the motion smooth. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply when pulling back.
Nice job completing the first repetition! Ensure the movement is a smooth circle.
Second rep starting well. Continue to focus on the shoulder blade movement.
Excellent! You're really getting the squeeze and circular motion. Keep up the good breathing pattern.
Great finish! You completed both repetitions with good form, focusing on the shoulder blade movement and breathing.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Breathing deeply as you pull back helps improve oxygen flow. Keep practicing this to regain shoulder mobility.
